Detailed Description

Geometric transformations.

Geometric transformation.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum cvl_interpolation_type_t

The interpolation technique.

Enumerator:
CVL_NONE  No interpolation (nearest neighbor).
CVL_BILINEAR  Bilinear interpolation.
CVL_BIQUADRATIC  Biquadratic interpolation.
CVL_BICUBIC  Bicubic interpolation.

Function Documentation

cvl_frame_t* cvl_affine ( cvl_frame_t *  frame,
const float *  matrix,
cvl_interpolation_type_t  interpolation_type,
const float *  val 
)

Parameters:
frame The frame.
matrix A 2x2 transformation matrix as an array of 4 floats.
interpolation_type The interpolation type to use.
val The values to fill resulting holes with.
Returns:
The transformed frame.
Applies an affine transformation to a frame. The resulting frame will be large enough to hold the complete result. Holes will be filled with the 4 given values in val.

cvl_frame_t* cvl_rotate ( cvl_frame_t *  frame,
float  angle,
cvl_interpolation_type_t  interpolation_type,
const float *  val 
)

Parameters:
frame The frame.
angle The rotation angle in radians [0,2PI].
interpolation_type The interpolation type to use.
val The values to fill resulting holes with.
Returns:
The transformed frame.
Rotates a frame counterclockwise. The resulting frame will be large enough to hold the complete result. Holes will be filled with the given color. Holes will be filled with the 4 given values in val.

cvl_frame_t* cvl_shear ( cvl_frame_t *  frame,
float  shear_angle_x,
float  shear_angle_y,
cvl_interpolation_type_t  interpolation_type,
const float *  val 
)

Parameters:
frame The frame.
shear_angle_x The shear angle in horizontal direction, in radians.
shear_angle_y The shear angle in vertical direction, in radians.
interpolation_type The interpolation type to use.
val The values to fill resulting holes with.
Returns:
The transformed frame.
Shears a frame. The angles should be from (-PI/2, PI/2). Negative angles shear clockwise. The angles should not be to close to -PI/2 or PI/2, or the resulting frame will be unreasonably wide. Holes will be filled with the 4 given values in val.

cvl_frame_t* cvl_scale ( cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  new_width,
int  new_height,
cvl_interpolation_type_t  interpolation_type 
)

Parameters:
frame The frame.
new_width The new width.
new_height The new height.
interpolation_type The interpolation type to use.
Returns:
The scaled frame.
Scales a frame.

void cvl_flip ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
Flips a frame vertically.

void cvl_flop ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
Flops a frame horizontally.
